meta.title: Skyesoft Governance Violation
meta.description: Canonical record of a governed audit violation, including observation, resolution state, and non-authoritative narrative commentary.

violations.observation: Repository inventory violation: unexpected dir '/temp-inventory-test-1' exists but not declared

details: Applicable rule evaluated in current governed audit run
Violation condition observed: declared missing '/temp-inventory-test-1' is unexpected
This violation has been observed 1 time
Status reflects current observation only
No determination made regarding cause or future recurrence

resolutionNotes.summary: The previously observed condition associated with the identified artifact was not observed in the evaluated state.
details: The applicable rule was evaluated during a governed audit run.
The previously recorded violation condition was not observed.
Resolution status reflects observation only.
No determination is made regarding cause or future recurrence.
The previously observed condition associated with the identified artifact was not observed in the evaluated state at the path '/temp-inventory-test-1'.

violations.observation: Merkle integrity violation: observed Codex state does not match governed Merkle snapshot.

violationNotes.summary: A Merkle root mismatch was observed during this audit run.
details: The observed Merkle state differs from the governed snapshot.
This condition was observed once in this audit run.
Human review may be required.

resolutionNotes.summary: The previously observed condition associated with the identified artifact was not observed in the evaluated state.
details: The applicable rule 'merkleIntegrity' was evaluated during a governed audit run.
The previously recorded violation condition associated with the artifact 'codex/codex.json' was not observed in the evaluated state.
Resolution status reflects observation only.
No determination is made regarding cause or future recurrence.
